actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend educational assistance benefits to dependents of veterans with a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' educational assistance provisions to extend educational assistance benefits to dependents of veterans with a service-connected disability rating of 80 percent or more (currently, 100 percent).

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend educational assistance benefits to dependents of veterans with a service-connected disability of 80 percent or more.
